This week we'll continue our study of physician agency and treatment decisions, focusing in particular on capitated payments.


### Objectives for this week

- Define a capitated payment
- Solve for treatment levels with capitated payments


### Activities
- In-class problem on physician agency with capitated payments. The worksheet is [here](/resource/wksheet6.html).
- Supplemental slides on [Homework 2](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1hiZPH_dIAT5XatfQ6xaNkDiLc_JuXEjhiq4eNJugb14/edit?usp=sharing)
- Weekly check-in on Friday
